name: Tinder Performance Art
description:
At that time I did an experiment using tinder (and other similar networks) making analogies about the relationship of power, sex and food: street food, fast food and typical food. At the time I lived in Berlin and I was really tired with the kind of approach I received from Europeans. I was part of a colonizing and stereotyped vision of "Latina", "Brazilian".
⠀
Living, working, studying in another country as well as dealing with immigration bureaucracy also had to deal with issues of hypersexualization. At that time, when I decided to make a tinder to meet people it was absurdly frustrating, so I decided to hack these networks and frustrate users.
